headline: Frontend Developer @ Attentions AI | Next.js | React | Chakra UI | WebSockets | FastAPI | Node.js | Redis | MongoDB | MCA @ VIT, Vellore
summary: I am a dedicated Frontend Developer at Attentions AI, where I single-handedly revamped our application from React to Next.js. This transition significantly improved performance and scalability while reducing load times through features like server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), and automatic code-splitting.  To enhance user interactions, I implemented a scalable and efficient communication system between the client and server. By leveraging WebSockets, Server-Sent Events, and direct Next.js route handler connections to Redis Pub/Sub, I enabled dynamic component loading based on user prompts and AI model responses. These optimizations resulted in a seamless, real-time user experience.  Equipped with a Master's degree in Computer Applications from Vellore Institute of Technology, I have a strong foundation in JavaScript (ES6+), React, Next.js, Redux, TypeScript, GraphQL, and Python. While my primary focus is frontend web development, I also explore FastAPI, Node.js, and Docker to broaden my expertise.  Last but not least, I love Star Wars, Spider-Man, and Batman movies.
position_description_1: - Revamped the entire app from React to Next.js, improving performance, scalability, and SEO. - Implemented server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), and automatic code-splitting, reducing load times and enhancing user experience. - Leveraged WebSockets and Server-Sent Events (SSE) to enable real-time updates. - Connected Next.js route handlers directly to Redis Pub/Sub, ensuring seamless data flow between AI models and the frontend. - Enabled dynamic component loading based on user prompts and AI model responses, improving responsiveness and interactivity. - Optimized state management and introduced custom hooks for cleaner, reusable, and maintainable code. - Enhanced the application's modularity, making it easier to scale and maintain.
position_description_2: - Built the e-commerce web app using React and NextJs 13 with smooth user experience and flows. - Built an admin dashboard to oversee orders and critical info. - Integrated with the backend team to make changes regarding API.
position_description_3: - Built reusable code structures and libraries for scaling. - Coordinated with other teams across the VERB to support VERB studio in achieving its goal
position_description_4: Acquired brief knowledge about XSS Attacks, SQL Injection, DDOS Attacks and other vulnerabilities that affect a modern network.
education_description_1: Learned deeper concepts of web and software development, machine learning and data mining.
education_description_2: Learned the concepts of Object Oriented Programming and Artificial Intelligence.

headline: Data Scientist
summary: I am a Data enthusiast and have been working on data analysis, machine learning and neural networks models. Prediction of useful information from raw data is what fascinated me to join the field.
position_description_4: Cars24 is a company which leads in the used cars business in India. The company leverages a unique auction system where verified dealers can participate and bid on the used cars.  As a data scientist at Cars24 I took upon various project, like, identifying fraudulent bidding, identifying downgrades in re-inspection of a car and running auction for inventory based cars.  We used a XGBoost model to classify if a particular auction is a fraudulent auction. This would in-turn flag fraudulent auction so that we pre-emptively take a token amount from a dealer to confirm the booking. This brought down the rate of high loss causing cars from 5.5% to sub 2%.  Performed further feature engineering for the same, and created new feature which would include some auction information, multiple dealer collusion behavior, collusion on the basis of geo-location and duplicate dealer flag. This would in-turn save ~3 million worth of loss per month.  Owned and improved the existing downgrade identification API, which would be responsible in identifying and flagging any downgrades between consecutive inspection of a car. Reduced the error rate of the API from 20% to sub 1% and improved the response time of the API from ~10sec/request to ~0.9sec/request.
position_description_5: Developed a statistical model to identify tech/OPS caused anomalies in the business pipeline. This would in return trigger a series of RCA oriented actions to resolve the issues immediately and make the necessary improvements.  Developed a deep learning model which will yield the best matching pincodes for a given address. Used and explored various networks/layers like self attention network and Bi-LSTM layers to encode an address. This will be used as typeahead suggestion or pincode correction for business clients.  Designed and implemented a pipeline for address feature extraction (e.g. locality, street) from historic addresses and their coordinates. This focused Delhivery's strategy of locality addition.
position_description_6: Created and implemented a graph based heuristic search algorithm to identify geo-location of a given address. Used top k Max Score optimisation to improve speed which helped in making the service synchronous. The algorithm is used to drive Delhivery's entire express business.  Developed an optimisation framework using tensorflow to learn weights of features in above used heuristic function. This further improved the accuracy, impacting thousands of shipments per day.  Optimised various analysis requiring heavy computation, by switching to AWS sagemaker.  Created a framework  to simulate Delhivery's package delivery life-cycle. This is being used to identify anomalies so that we can continuously monitor and improve our metrics.  Created a syntax checker for addresses using HMM.
education_1: The LNM Institute of Information Technology

headline: Building AI Solutions @ Aidetic | LLM, NLP | Ex-Quantiphi
summary: As a Lead Machine Learning Engineer at iSchoolConnect, I create innovative AI solutions to help students achieve their academic and career goals. I have a Master of Technology degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Jaypee University of Information Technology, where I developed a keen interest in Data Science, Deep Learning, and IoT.  One of my major contributions is developing a Student Enrollment and Graduation Success Knowledge Graph solution, which leverages Neo4j Graph Data Science Library and custom BERT models to provide course and job recommendations for students. I also worked on a credit transfer evaluation system that uses skillBERT and JobBERT models to map student courses to optimal university programs and maximize credit transfer. I use text-tabular multimodal transformers to handle textual, numerical, and categorical data. Additionally, I created AI, Human-in-loop, and management dashboards with Bigquery and Google Data Studio to monitor and improve the online exam proctoring product.  I am proficient in large language models, natural language processing, and computer vision. I am passionate about applying AI to solve real-world problems and enhance learning outcomes.

position_description_3: Working on Student Enrollment & Graduation Success Knowledge graph solution with help of Neo4j Graph DataScience Library and custom BERT solutions for the course and job recommendations for students.  Working on the credit transfer evaluation system to map student courses to applied university program courses to find optimal programs and maximize credits transfer ensuring higher enrollment and graduation chances. Used skillBert & Skillspanbert models to extract skills and JobBert to provide personalised job recommendations for students. Graph embeddings were created using the Graphsage & Sentence transformer.  Fine-tuned text-tabular multimodal transformer to handle textual, numerical and categorical multimillion-sized datasets for the downstream task of credit transfer with 99% skewness and achieved 94% accuracy which has the potential to reduce operations cost by 85% and turnaround time from 9 days to 2 days.
position_description_4: Worked on an Online Exam proctoring product to monitor suspicious activities both using AI and Human-in-loop solutions with help of multiple computer vision models.   A major contribution is by creating AI, Human-in-loop, and management dashboards with Bigquery and Google data studio with scalable ETL pipelines.

Using spaCy as a framework built custom NER(Named Entity Recognition) and Relation Extractor and deployed using Graph Commons with Neo4j graph database.

My strong analytical skills and attention to detail, combined with my expertise in Python, SQL, Tableau, and Excel, make me well-suited for this field.  I have a deep understanding of data analysis techniques and tools, and the ability to extract, manipulate and interpret data, identify trends and patterns, and communicate insights to drive business growth. My experience in web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allows me to bring a unique perspective to the data analyst role.  I am eager to apply my skills and experience to help organizations make data-driven decisions and drive business growth. My goal is to use data analytics to improve business performance, optimize product development, and make data-driven decisions that drive business growth.  My web development experience has given me a good understanding of web technologies and front-end frameworks, which are all transferable skills that can be used to support data analysis. Additionally, I am always willing to learn new technologies, which can help me to adapt to any new requirements of a data analyst role.  I am excited to connect with professionals in the field and learn more about opportunities to apply my skills and experience. My analytical skills, attention to detail and passion for data analysis, along with my experience in web development technologies make me a strong candidate for any data analyst role. I'm confident that I can make a meaningful contribution to your team and help you achieve your business goals.

headline: Engineering Leader | YC Alum | Build AI Agents | Speaker | Tech Innovation
summary: Aankit is looking to build multi-agent AI systems that serve millions of users every day  leveraging technical fundamentals.   Tech entrepreneur backed by Y Combinator with 10+ years of experience in building multiple highly engaging B2C platforms, scaled to 5M+ users, providing a smooth experience with 14 ms avg server response time, 99.8% crash-free users, and 99.5% uptime with limited Infra budget. Built 0-1 multiple times.   Worked with Imumz as Head of Engineering, automated engineering processes, and enhanced the user experience through engineering solutions and building a startup culture.   Worked with Writesonic and significantly improved website performance, managing to scale the service to support over 3 million monthly active users and reduce the library page load time from 1.5 seconds to 300 milliseconds. Under his leadership, the team grew threefold, from 10 to around 30 members, including contractors, and attracted engineers from renowned companies such as Amazon and Byju. He further contributed to migrating the company's marketing website from Webflow to Nextjs, achieving a lighthouse score of 90+ for improved performance. System efficiency was enhanced by introducing queues, caching, API Gateway, and lambda functions. Had experience in building Gen AI applications using LLM agents engineering.   Built Khabri audio platform from scratch, enabling individuals to share and connect with the content they value. Khabri started with news as an offering and then branched into multiple categories. With more than 150K content creators, and 5M downloads.  Prior to co-founding Khabri, he worked at OnlineTyari as a Senior Software Engineer building an online learning platform for the millions of people who aspire to bag a government job. This was the time he got an opportunity to build products at scale leveraging the power of technology. He also worked, just after his graduation in computer science, with Nucleus Software Pvt Ltd in the R&D Mobility team as Software Engineer, where he realized his true potential in solving technical problems and handling challenges.  Areas: Architecture, Complex Problem Solving, Data Processing Pipelines, Building High Performing Teams, LLM Agents Engineering Wanna chat? Reachable at aankitroy1990@gmail.com

headline: Product & Growth @ Zomato | IIT Kanpur
summary: Divyanshu graduated from Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur in 2018, and has over 6 years of experience across product, growth management & cost optimisations. He also has in-depth knowledge of data analytics and visualisations.  Currently he is working as product lead, monetisation charter for Zomato, where he primarily works to drive revenue generation while maintaining platform health and user experience. His work involves designing and enhancing ad products and optimising ad delivery strategies. Divyanshu also worked with consumer product team where he was designing homepage listing algorithms and growth & retention strategies using product, promo & strategic levers to drive user experience.  Before joining the product team, Divyanshu worked as the growth lead for Zomato‚Äôs flagship savings program - Zomato Gold, where he designed expansion & pricing frameworks to take Gold live in 200+ cities with differentially priced plans to maximize customer retention and revenue.  He has also worked with the customer growth team, leading promo strategy & new customer onboarding for Zomato. Prior to that he worked at Absolutdata, where he developed high-level solution architecture and worked with teams of big-data engineers and data scientists to build, test and assess analytical machine learning models to optimize business outcomes. He also lead discussions with business stakeholders in order to develop strategic actions and marketing plans as per the analytical outcomes.  An avid cricket and football fan, Divyanshu was involved with the institute cricket team and sports contingent, and has won multiple medals in various tournaments while representing IIT Kanpur.  **Views expressed on Linkedin are his own and do not reflect those of Zomato Group, its group companies, management, clients, partners or any other affiliated party.

headline: Senior Data Scientist
Senior Data Scientist @ Zomato | Expertise in Python, AI/ML | Ex- Ecom Express, Cars24, AIISC, Walmart Labs, 99 Roomz | BITS Pilani '21
summary: Experienced Data Scientist with 4+ years of expertise in Python, Pandas, NumPy, SQL specializing in data analysis, preprocessing, and visualization. Skilled in extracting actionable insights from complex datasets using advanced statistical techniques, machine learning models, and deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch. Proficient in designing and deploying predictive analytics, classification models, and recommendation systems to solve real-world business problems. Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP), scalable APIs, and database management. Adept at bridging the gap between data insights and business impact, driving data-driven decision-making for enhanced organizational performance. Passionate about data storytelling, automation, and operational excellence in domains such as logistics, e-commerce, and fraud detection.
position_description_2: Reattempt Delivery Success Prediction : Developed a deep learning model to predict the success probability of reattempted deliveries, effectively enabling delivery centers to prioritize high-probability cases. The solution significantly improved operational efficiency by accurately forecasting 90% of successful conversions, while reducing the overall attempt ratio to just 55%, saving valuable resources and time.  Geocoder : Developed a geocode prediction system for delivery addresses using historical delivery data. Implemented median-based geo-code selection with Haversine distance optimization and error radius estimation. Achieved 85% accuracy, with true results falling within the desired error radius, improving address accuracy and delivery efficiency for both known and new addresses.  Geotag Validation System : Developed a geotag validation system to enhance delivery accuracy by improving location data reliability. Implemented a system that flagged potentially incorrect deliveries, achieving 80% accuracy in geocode validation. Utilized historical data and key metrics to improve operational efficiency with potential for further refinement in edge cases and address intelligence.
position_description_3: DS/ML Labs- Fraud Detection - Maintained the Fraud Model, continuously making improvements to lower cancellation rate at lower flag rate - Working on retraining the model further for better efficiency - Handled survivorship bias issue in data ( missing on critical data points as there were detected and prevented by the previous model. )  Inventory Liquidation -Helped liquidating stuck inventory by estimating the fairliquidation price using histocal data with inventory age, no of inventory auctions as key variable. Model predicting 70% prices within +/-5% and 90% within +/-10% of actual selling price.
position_description_4: Fraud Detection - Laid various hypothesis and analysed historical data to identify patterns causing high loss / cancellation. Retrained Fraud Model with new features ( Precision - 50%; recall - 32% ) covering 65% of the cancellations at 5% flag rate. Reduced Cancellation rate from 18% to 10% and average loss on cancelled cars by 30k.  Australia Pricing Module - Built the Pricing Model and API for Australia Module. Scrapped Data by setting up crons for various auction houses of Australia. Used OCR to extract vehicle data and bid price. Used vehicle condition data to predict refurb cost. Worked on clickstream and MSRP data to understand buying patterns and predict depreciation.
organization_5: Artificial Intelligence Institute at University of South Carolina

headline: Sr Data Scientist | BITS Pilani
summary: As a Data Scientist , I apply my Machine Learning skills to build and deploy scalable and robust machine learning solutions for the fintech industry. Previously, I worked as a Staff Data Scientist at Simpl, where I led a team of two data scientists in developing and deploying an underwriting machine learning model that improved approval rates by 5% and reduced delinquency by 2%. I also managed data infrastructure, including data pipelines and databases, to ensure data quality and accessibility for the underwriting team. At Razorpay, I designed and implemented an end-to-end solution for smart routing of payments, saving millions of dollars and increasing the success rate by 4-6%. I published a paper at IEEE Conference for the same.  I hold a Master of Science in Mathematics from BITS Pilani and a PG Diploma in Machine Learning and AI from IIIT Bangalore. I am passionate about learning new technologies and tools, and I have obtained multiple certifications, including Google Cloud Platform Associate Cloud Engineer and Technical Intern from Visakhapatnam Steel Plant. I have also been an integral part of the Learning and Development Committee to train the newly joined campus hires joining as Machine Learning Engineers. My goal is to leverage my skills and experience to deliver value and innovation for the fintech sector.

headline: Leading engineering operations at Golgix, Inc.
summary: Hello! I'm a Full Stack Engineer with a passion for doing impactful work that helps organizations save costs and other engineers do their job better. Currently, I'm working with the core team in India for the Mercari C2C domain. My strengths lie in backend engineering, and I'm developing a growing interest in platform and infrastructure engineering.   As a solo Backend Platform Engineer at LILA Games, I optimized build pipelines, migrated infrastructure and architected and executed backend data flows in GoLang using the Nakama framework. At Mercari JP, as part of the Master User Team, I designed and managed microservices, migrated master endpoints to gRPC, and pioneered decommissioning unused microservices to save costs. I'm also a former Google Summer of Code Student Software Developer.   In all my work, I prioritize creating efficient solutions and improving documentation to help others work more effectively. I'm excited to connect and collaborate with fellow engineers who share my passion for impactful work!
position_description_1: As the Tech Lead of Engineering Operations, I am responsible for spearheading the strategy and execution of Golgix's cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and overall system and services reliability. My role is focused on building a scalable, secure, and highly automated foundation to accelerate development and ensure operational excellence.  Key Responsibilities:  - Infrastructure & Cloud Management: Leading the architecture and maintenance of our AWS infrastructure using Terraform, including managing EC2 instances, networking, IAM, and cost optimization. This involves championing cloud cleanup initiatives and migrating services to stable, custom DNS to enhance maintainability. - Automation & CI/CD: Driving the evolution of our automation and CI/CD practices by architecting and implementing CI pipelines for infrastructure, optimizing Docker build processes for significant performance gains, and developing more resilient build scripts. - Deployment & Release Engineering: Owning the end-to-end deployment process across numerous multi-client environments. This includes designing and refining proprietary tools to standardize releases and eliminate manual interventions. - Technical Leadership & Standards: Providing architectural guidance on new projects, enforcing engineering best practices for security and code quality, and mentoring team members. Acting as the central point of communication for all operational matters to ensure clear and consistent updates to all stakeholders. - System Reliability & Performance: Overseeing system monitoring, alerting, and performance diagnostics. This includes establishing robust logging with AWS CloudWatch and authoring comprehensive guides for diagnosing and resolving system-level issues to ensure high availability.
position_description_2: - Led backend architecture and hands-on development for Mercari‚Äôs Global One Product (GoP), designing BFF (Backend-For-Frontend) layers and critical microservices supporting international expansion and new product features. - Drove platform-wide infrastructure transformation with Terraform, Kubernetes (GKE), CUE, and Google Cloud Platform; rolled out universal authentication and internationalization (i18n) middleware adopted by 8+ development teams. - Built and launched core modules including Social features (likes, browsing history) and an Order Management Service, delivering extensible foundations for new and scalable user experiences. - Modernized master data delivery pipelines using active-passive DB patterns, CDN caching, and authored Python client libraries, dramatically improving reliability and enabling multi-language data consumption. - Enhanced system stability by engineering circuit breaker solutions for high-traffic services, proactively mitigating OOM risks, and redesigning CI/CD workflows for zero-downtime deployments. - Advanced engineering culture by establishing backend hiring assessments, improving developer workflows, and organizing regular knowledge-sharing sessions across teams.  Tech: Go (Golang), Python, gRPC, Protobuf, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, GCP, CI/CD (WarpSpeed CD, GitHub Actions), Microservices, System & API Design, Distributed Systems, Internationalisation, Authentication
position_description_3: During my time at LILA Games, I served as the sole backend and platform engineer, allowing me to expand my skill set and take on a wide range of responsibilities. One of my significant achievements was setting up an improved build pipeline that significantly reduced build time by over 50% by parallelizing cross-platform builds.  Another significant accomplishment was migrating infrastructure from various cloud providers to Google Cloud Platform services, including GKE, GCS, L4 Load Balancers, and others. I also created Git-versioned K8S and Terraform manifests as part of the process.  Working on all game features, I was responsible for designing and implementing the data flow in the backend using the Nakama framework and GoLang. Some notable systems that I created include missions, loot distribution, and character profiles.  Lastly, I was responsible for setting up analytics and LiveOps for the game. I used a combination of GCP tools, including Big Query, Data Flow, and PubSub, along with in-house backend interaction tools created using Retool to accomplish this task.
position_description_4: As a Backend Game Developer (Contractor) at LILA Games, I had the opportunity to work on Project BLACK, an exciting Loot & Survival game. I developed a scalable backend system using the Nakama framework, ensuring smooth and reliable gameplay for our players.  In addition, I set up efficient build processes and deployment pipelines using GitHub actions, Agones, and containerization. These improvements not only reduced costs but also increased QA cycles, allowing us to deliver high-quality content in a timely manner.  I optimized and designed database storage models, ensuring fast and efficient data retrieval for both authoritative and client queries. Additionally, I implemented player progression data storage, providing valuable insights to the game's design and balancing.  Overall, my experience as a Backend Game Developer at LILA Games allowed me to work on an exciting project while honing my skills in backend development, optimization, and database management.
position_description_5: During my internship with the Master User Team at Mercari Japan, I designed, developed and managed microservices of the Master domain to manage Master data such as ItemBrands, ItemCategories, and Configs, as well as Lottery service for campaigns. I contributed to the team in the following ways:  - Designed the migration of Master endpoints from PHP monolith HTTP endpoints to gRPC endpoints written in Golang, improving performance and scalability. - Spearheaded the decommissioning of unused microservices to save costs and prepared an organizational-wide process for safe and fast removal of unused microservices. - Developed the i18n middleware for Mercari's microservice kit, which helped other teams quickly migrate to v2 gRPC endpoints. I also implemented PoC in master-jp microservice. - Led the OKR to reduce engineering hours required to update client configs, which resulted in a significant reduction from ~4 hrs/week to zero. I achieved this by migrating configs from JSON-based store to Firebase. - Investigated and designed solutions to secure the master-tool used to update master data behind Mercari's VPN, improving the overall security of the tool. - Created and improved documentation for tasks and processes that I went through, helping other developers to work efficiently.  In this role, I worked with a range of technologies including Golang, PHP, gRPC, Kubernetes, GKE, Spanner, DataDog, and Spinnaker.
position_description_6: Managing a concise and concentrated team of 5+ members to create and maintain the technology infrastructure for IIT Technology Ambit, a startup aiming at serving research news in a digestable manner right from the premiere institutes of the country.  - Responsible for curating a pure RESTful API with database handling using Object Relational Mapping to MySQL. - Using ReactJS with other components to deliver consistent frontend experience across devices with the help of Progressive Web App development techniques. - Handling entire developer options including but not limited to server operations, bulk communication infrastructure, DNS management and more. - Responsible for hiring new technical talent from the campus and working closely with design and content team to ensure consistency across different departments. - Occasionally writing technical content and tutorials for the magazine.
position_description_7: Students' Technology Coordinator is a nominated position under the constitution of Technology Students' GymKhana, IIT Kharagpur. The person holding, the highest technical implementation and development position in the institute, is responsible for the smooth building and development of all technological growth aspects; official website maintenance, mobile app development, students' grievance portal and implementation of proposals of Vice President and General Secretaries of GymKhana.  I worked passionately during my tenure and implemented open source ethics and practices in document management, code sanitization, and CI/CD processes in order to streamline the development, testing, and deployment process. I also created a systematic organization that would allow the passing of knowledge and responsibilities between consecutive position holders very smooth. This is in addition to the numerous initiatives I took and various technical feats achieved for the Gymkhana digitization process.
position_description_8: Worked on Continuous Integration platform for CCExtractor's principal repository: - Improved the python code sanity checking mechanisms through mypy, dodgy and other tools.  - Using Python's mocking unit-tests increased unit-test coverage from 60.2\% to 90+\%.  - Responsible for setting up database migration methods and improving file diff algorithms.  - Implemented multiprocessing and parallelisation using Python's multiprocessing module and bypassing Global Interpreter lock for using multiple-cores. - Implemented automation scripts to update outdated regression test output and improved overall efficiency of regression test output delivery from taking 50+ seconds to 5 (+-1) seconds using delivery fragmentation.
position_description_9: Worked as a backend engineer for Cleartax's ITR filing tool closely working with financial experts.  - Updated stale data in micro-services and API data-layers fixing issues with the external REST API endpoints.  - Synchronized ITR-2, ITR-3 and ITR-4 filing with Income Tax Department's new schema for 2018 fiscal-year ITR filing while retaining backward compatibility with 2017 ITR filing. - Enabled ITR filing for Non Residential Indians by incorporating missing fields and adding relevant logical switches in ITR-2, ITR-3 and ITR-5. - Improved Developer-Operations and debugging capability by implementing logging of crucial parameters using IIS Manager, Scalyr, Spinnaker and Jenkins. - Developed captcha solver for Income Tax Department's login using convolutional neural network with TensorFlow, OpenCV and Keras achieving 94.3% accuracy. - Enabled A/B testing with Google Tag Manager and Google Optimize along with orchestrating multiple tools for easy data visualisation (for use by Business and Marketing department) with Retool.
position_description_10: Software as a Service (SaaS) platform founded and launched in June 2019 to ease the setting up and execution of cron-tasks; led the tech-team with stack comprising of Google Cloud Platform (AppEngine, CloudSQL, PubSub, CloudScheduler), Python, PostgreSQL, Kubernetes API and more.

headline: Data Engineer @Cars24
summary: Experienced Data Engineer | Software Engineering Background | 11+ Years of Expertise  Passionate Data Engineer with over a decade of experience in designing and optimizing data pipelines, ensuring data quality, and integrating advanced analytics tools to empower organizations with actionable insights. Here's what I bring to the table:  - Expertise in orchestrating ETL pipelines, including data cleansing, transformation, and auditing for clickstream data. - Proven success in integrating and managing analytics platforms such as Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Snowplow Analytics, and Amplitude. - Skilled in creating dynamic reports, dashboards, and visualizations to drive data-driven decisions across teams. - Proficient in optimizing cloud infrastructure for cost efficiency while scaling ETL pipelines for seamless data ingestion. - Adept at mentoring and training team members, leading interviews, and building high-performing data engineering teams. - Developed scalable, serverless microservices leveraging AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS, Elasticache for Redis, GraphQL, and Terraform. - Hands-on experience with Snowflake Data Warehouse for query optimization, reporting, and business intelligence.  Technical Skills: ETL Pipelines | Data Cleansing & Transformation | AWS | GCP | SQL | Python | Snowflake | BigQuery | Redshift | DBT | Airflow | Docker | StarRocks | Superset | Analytics Integration (GA, GTM, Snowplow, Amplitude) | Microservices (NestJS, Typescript, Serverless Framework) | Terraform | Fivetran | Apache NiFi | Dataflow  Collaborating closely with stakeholders, clients, and teams, I pride myself on delivering innovative and impactful solutions tailored to business needs. Whether it‚Äôs streamlining data workflows or enabling robust analytics, I‚Äôm committed to driving value and fostering growth. summary: - The views and opinions expressed in all posts are solely my own in my personal capacity. They do not represent, reflect, or purport to represent the views, positions, strategies, or policies of my employer, past or present, or any affiliated organizations. Nothing in this post should be construed as an official statement or endorsement. - I may be unable to respond to all DMs. Please excuse me if I am unable to. - I have reached the maximum number of connections allowed by LinkedIn, I request that you choose the "follow" option.   About me -  I lead Human Resources at Merck India, a leading Science and Technology company, with nearly 20 years of experience in HR and business leadership. I am passionate about driving transformative change and organizational success by crafting and executing strategies for sustainable growth and excellence.   My strategic approach to HR goes beyond traditional practices, as I align HR initiatives with overarching business objectives, creating a powerful synergy that elevates performance and fuels innovation. I have built high-performing teams that serve as catalysts for business growth in diverse industries and markets, leveraging my expertise in HR Strategy, HR Business Partnering, Talent Management, and Talent Acquisition. I am also a champion of Responsible Diversity and Inclusion, as I believe it is a strategic imperative that unlocks untapped potential and drives creativity and adaptability. In my current role, I am the country sponsor of the ‚ÄúI am Proud‚Äù ERG.   I hold a post-graduate degree in HR and L&D, and I am proud to be a Wharton School-certified expert in Talent Strategy. I operated at the intersection of product, engineering, and data science, helping shape scalable and clinically relevant solutions for a major US healthcare payer.  Key Contributions:  ->Data-Driven Product QA: Acted as the ‚Äúfirst user‚Äù of the platform during pre-release cycles‚Äîproactively identifying usability friction points and data integrity concerns across claims data workflows, provider analytics, and AI model outputs.  ->Claims Data Expertise: Worked hands-on with payer claims data, designing data validation logic and translating complex healthcare business rules (e.g., parity checks, benefit eligibility, provider behavior) into workflows that aligned with client goals.  ->Collaboration with PM & DS Teams: Partnered with product managers and data scientists to define edge cases, refine anomaly detection logic, and prioritize fixes based on business impact‚Äîenhancing both the model reliability and end-user trust.  ->Tooling & Decision Support: Developed dashboards in Power BI/Tableau that surfaced recurring claim issues, flagged high-risk providers, and visualized AI predictions‚Äîimproving visibility for both internal teams and external stakeholders.  ->Agile & Product Lifecycle Ownership: Participated in sprint planning, backlog refinement, and user story reviews, helping ensure that product deliverables were aligned to both engineering feasibility and real-world healthcare workflows.

position_description_1: Helping enterprises scale their application delivery velocity with governance. Enabling customer to shift focus and transform their application delivery from silo tools to modern high velocity software delivery with security using Harness Platform.   Harness SaaS Platform provides a wide range of product coupled in a single platform catering to critical application delivery needs. For Seamless Continuous Integration with Intelligence  using CI, for deploying modern microservices & application with CD. The platform also provides Extensive Feature Flag capability with intelligence and governance with the Feature Flag module. Service Reliability and Chaos Engineering module ensures that applications SLA are met with resilience intact. Additionally the platform has extensive OPA based governance and provides a capability to orchestrate most of the security or vulnerability tools. Last but not the least, the platform provides modern approach to cut cloud costs significantly  & provide transparency as well as visibility to all the granular cloud spends. headline: TA Agile Strategist, Career Enabler and Recruiting Evangelist üáÆüá≥üèçÔ∏è
summary: It is often said that the greatest of discoveries have happened by chance. This has proved to be true in my case.  Although I stumbled upon being a recruiter by accident, I have since realized that it is more than a passion to me; it is a calling. Interacting with people from various walks of life, understanding their wants & needs, and matching them with those of the organization only begins to explain my thrill and joy of fulfilling and bridging these gaps.  Having worked for over 17 years in a variety of domains such as Product hiring, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Storage, Cloud Computing, etc., I have developed a deep structural understanding of the TA Hiring process. This, along with my analytical mindset has enabled me to create, lead and implement innovative recruitment strategies for niche, complex & hard-to-find technology skills; filling a variety of senior-level, managerial, and executive positions and adroit at Competency-based Leadership hiring.  I have excelled in building teams grounds up for EMC's IONIX team, Redhat‚Äôs Storage R&D, IBM; Software Labs (Gravitant; Hybrid Cloud CoE, Cloud Brokerage, IoT Watson Conversational Development team), Reliance Jio‚Äôs Artificial Intelligence CoE, AJIO and continue to do so for Swiggy‚Äôs Instamart, Minis, Genie, New Initiatives and Building a sustainable and scalable organization as part of Future-proofing in Tech Hiring.  My fascination for unconventional recruitment methods to source passive candidates through various source channels and search methodologies such as #AgileTA framework, LinkedIn, Belong Video sourcing (BombBomb, Youtube, Vimeo), X-Raying, Advanced Boolean search, Image search, GitHub, Octohunt, Swoop, Slideshare, Stackoverflow, Buffer, Kaggle, Flutter, and various community-based hiring has proved to be highly effective.  *Ensuring the best possible candidate and interview experience, both delights and motivates me*

I have collaborated with startups to build responsive and engaging web applications.  ‚öôÔ∏è Full-stack Mindset: Having a strong foundation in backend development with Golang, I possess a comprehensive understanding of the entire development stack. This enables me to create end-to-end solutions that are scalable, efficient, and secure.  üöÄ Startup Experience: I have worked with various startups, thriving in dynamic and fast-paced environments. This has honed my ability to adapt quickly, collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, and meet project milestones.  üåê Passion for Innovation: I am passionate about staying updated with the latest industry trends and emerging technologies. Let's connect to explore potential collaborations or discuss how I can contribute to your organization's growth and success.
position_description_2: At Equal Identity, I‚Äôve had the opportunity to work across the stack on some really exciting identity and financial data products.  I started by building and maintaining multiple identity verification flows in our Identity Gateway frontend ‚Äî from document verification to real-time checks. I also led the integration of two key verification features: bank statement OCR and LinkedIn profile verification, handling both the backend and frontend for a seamless user experience.  To improve our deployment workflow, I built a frontend versioning and rollback system using CloudFront, S3, and AWS CodePipeline, and later moved the setup to AWS CDK for better automation and consistency.  I also worked on the Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) architecture for OneMoney‚Äôs frontend, and developed React SDKs for clients like Zerodha, AngelOne, and Tata AMC. On the mobile side, I helped maintain our Android and iOS SDKs, and was the go-to person for resolving client issues and support requests.  Overall, I‚Äôve contributed to building reliable, secure, and easy-to-integrate identity tools ‚Äî and enjoyed working closely with both internal teams and clients to make it all happen.
position_description_3: During my time at Emint, I built several key features including Watchlist, Portfolio, Option Chain, and Order Placement. These were designed with a strong focus on speed, usability, and real-time accuracy.  One of my most impactful contributions was implementing a predictive WebSocket mechanism using a single shared connection. I built a system where each widget would subscribe and unsubscribe intelligently based on user navigation, and only re-render when there were actual updates, ensuring optimal performance and responsiveness across the app.  I also spent time optimizing the Option Chain UI, which is data-heavy and requires real-time updates. I redesigned it to be lightweight and performant, delivering smooth interaction even under high data flow conditions.  Working at Emint gave me a strong foundation in building high-performance trading interfaces and taught me how to manage live data streams, UI rendering strategies, and user experience in real-world financial products.

headline: 2X Founder | Co-Founder & CEO @ TagZ Foods (Acquired) | SharkTank Winner |TEDx Speaker | Brand, Strategy, Product, P&L, GTM, M&A and People | Startup Mentor |Shuttling between Bangalore - Bangkok
summary: I am the founder of TagZ, one of the most loved better-for-you D2C GenZ snacks brands in India.   I started my professional career nearly 20 years ago with some of the finest brands such as Coca Cola and Nokia. I spent the first half of my career with these fabulous brands learning about sales, marketing, brands, supply chain and most importantly about people and culture.   The latter part of my career has been all about building from scratch - Startups !  At Shotang, I built India's first tech-enabled retail distribution platform and scaled the business to a Series A+ stage across 7 cities, 30k retailers and multiple categories.   At Healthifyme, I played a key role in scaling the B2B business and building the marketplace and insurance partnerships from scratch.   At TagZ, I built the business and the brand from scratch and scaled it across the country and 5 international markets, raised capital, built the team and omnichannel GTM - before it got acquired.   TagZ is one of the most loved Shark Tank brands and backed by celebrities such as Shikhar Dhawan and Rannvijay. Its pioneering products such as Popped Potato Chips, Hemp Cookiez, Date MeltZ, Chocolate CigarZ, Corn Bhujia and the others have deeply entrenched consumer love.   Through these immersive professional experiences I have had the opportunity to live and work nearly in all states of India and hence developed deep consumer understanding.   It has been a pleasure building teams from scratch and more importantly creating strong cultural fabrics that build organisations. Business is afterall all about people!   On the personal side, I love spending time in the mountains - I have completed 8 Himalayan summits and counting. My deepest friendships are thanks to my love for golf and motorbiking is much more than just my zen. I am deeply passionate about leading and sharing an active life outdoors!   Looking ahead, I am super excited about the future of consumer brands in the fastest growing consumption-led economy - India !   New channels such as q-commerce and AI led developments in consumer-tech just make the future of this market just that much more exciting.   Happy to chat and share experiences about consumer markets literally from Kashmir to Kanyakumari !
position_description_1: We craft uber-premium snacking experiences for urban genZ consumers - which they love - not just because they are lip-smacking but also have a personality as lit and cool as theirs. Btw they are also regret-free!

headline: Data Analyst @ Swiggy ||  Data Scientist || Transforming raw data, uncovering hidden patterns, and turning complex data into meaningful solutions for improved decision-making.
summary: As a data scientist, I embark on a fascinating journey into the boundless realm of data. It's like peering into a treasure trove of possibilities, where patterns emerge, insights unfold, and solutions come to life. With a passion for uncovering the hidden gems within data, I thrive on delivering exceptional results and ensuring the utmost quality in every assignment.  With over 1.5 year of experience in the field, I have honed my expertise in statistical modeling, data visualization, data processing! data mining, and-did I mention-statistical modeling? Yes, it's a double dose of statistical magic! I wield these tools with finesse, transforming complex business problems into solvable puzzles.  But let's not forget the importance of humor along this data-driven journey. After all, who said data couldn't have a sense of humor? So, here I am, crunching numbers and cracking jokes-finding correlations and maybe a chuckle or two along the way.  I pride myself on being a result-oriented professional, driven by a burning desire to unearth insights that make a tangible impact. Implementing quality mechanisms is second nature to me; I leave ne stone unturned in my quest for excellence. From wrangling unruly datasets to crafting elegant visualizations, I ensure that the desired output sparkles with brilliance.  So, if you're ready to explore the enchanting world of data with a data scientist who brings both passion and a sprinkle of humor to the table, let's connect. headline: Analytics Manager @ Swiggy | Ex-Mu Sigma | Analytics, Data Science & BI | Experimentation, Causal Inference, & Product Analytics | SQL, Python, R, Power BI | Experience in Product, Business, RWE, and HEOR Analytics
summary: - Result-driven Data & Analytics professional with a proven track record of driving business impact through experimentation, automation, and data-driven decision-making.  - Skilled in A/B testing, causal inference, statistical modeling, and real-time analytics, with hands-on experience in product optimization, growth analytics, and supply strategy.  Product & Business Analytics - Designed A/B & switchback experiments optimizing product adoption & engagement - Eliminated $4K/day in revenue leakage, reducing restaurant attrition by 15% MoM through automated insights - Built scalable dashboards, removing manual tracking & saving 2 analyst-days per week - Enhanced category conversion (+1pp) and order contribution (+3pp) via consumer funnel optimizations  Real-World Evidence and HEOR: - Developed statistical models & real-world evidence (RWE) enabling $3.7M in savings & a $10M revenue boost - Improved model accuracy by 25% and reduced error by 15% through stable balancing weights in R and non-parametric bootstrapping, eliminating baseline bias and outperforming conventional propensity-based methods - Automated data workflows, cutting turnaround time by ~30% and reducing errors to zero. - Published research in Medical Devices: Evidence and Research (CiteScore 3.0) on clinical outcome comparisons.  Core Competencies ‚úî A/B Testing & Experimentation ‚úî SQL, Python, R: Data Wrangling and working with large streams datasets ‚úî Data pipeline creation, reporting, and visualization with PowerBi and Tableau ‚úî Causal Inference & Statistical Modeling ‚úî Advanced Excel Analysis (VBA, Index-Match, Pivot) ‚úî Data Pipeline Automation | Real-Time Analytics | Product & Business Growth Analytics ‚úî Data Visualization (Power BI, Tableau) | KPI Design | Cross-functional Collaboration & Mentorship
position_description_2: - Designed and executed A/B and switchback experiments, optimizing product/business metrics and informing key initiatives like On-Time Guarantee, Pocket Hero, Swiggy Occasions - Automated real-time performance dashboards, eliminating manual tracking and saving 2 analyst-days per week - Diagnosed and resolved $4K/day revenue leakage in restaurant billing & offer configurations - Reduced restaurant attrition by 15% MoM through weekly automated insights via email - Improved category order contribution by 3pp and category conversion by 1pp with 20K iOPD by identifying consumer journey gaps and implementing targeted funnel optimizations - Developed a supply-scoring framework, boosting hyperlocal sourcing efficiency and food widget conversions by 0.2pp - Established instrumentation for backend and frontend event logging, enabling real-time analytics and data-driven decisions
position_description_3: US Fortune 50 Healthcare Company | HEOR & RWE: - Distinguished causation from association (causal inference) using regression models, covariate balancing (using Stable Balancing Weights, Propensity Score Matching/Weighting/Stratification), cumulative incidence functions, hypothesis testing, and non-parametric bootstrapping to prove equivalence of our product with a comparator -  Generated Real-World Evidence (RWE) using analytics on patient level Real-World Data (RWD) sources like EMR (Mercy), EHR (Optum, Loopback), claims (IBM, SAF, Optum), and administrative (Premier) to measure HCRU, burden of illness, treatment patterns, effectiveness, and clinical outcomes -  Supported product commercialization, reimbursements, and value proposition of client‚Äôs products for HEMA stakeholders by producing statistical reports and doing extensive EDA on NLP datasets - Developed ADaM datasets, TLFs, safety packages, research protocols, clinical study reports with Descriptive and Statistical Inference analysis and proactively worked using vast real-world data sources to generate RWE -  Designed automated solutions for data extraction and output generation processes through SQL, R, VBA, and Python macros that reduced turnaround time for insight generation from 3-4 days to 1-2 hrs and made deliverables error-free
position_description_4: Bangalore Police (Cybercrime Division) | Cybercrime Insight Generation: - Collaborated with IPS officers from cybercrime division to understand their problem universe, hypothesis, project expectations, existing bottlenecks, and consequently developed iterative mock-ups to establish project scope - Leveraged VBA scripts to de-identify data, perform automated cleaning, and generated features using 6 cyber-crime datasets sourced from multiple platforms with varying time lags - Visualized KPIs in excel to identify stressed areas in cyber-crime reporting and investigation lifecycle using various charts and context filters
position_description_5: US Fortune 50 Home Improvement Company | Retail customer experience enhancement: -  Using customer segmentation and developing key performance indicators, improved customer experience for a Fortune 50 US-based home improvement retailer -  Identified disparities between queue wait-time for different customer segments where higher LTV customers had to wait longer in queues than lower LTV customers because of their usual cart size and store‚Äôs counter design -  Created Tableau dashboard to visualize identified KPIs like cart value and queue wait-time for different counters to establish association and drive changes in counter design to reduce wait time  US Fortune 50 Healthcare Company | HCP detailing during COVID: -  Stakeholders during the COVID-19 pandemic faced challenges in identifying healthcare professional clinics that remained open for "detailing" - Longitudinal multi-year data from 4 different data sources with different latency were used and micro-trends were analyzed to evaluate the odds of a clinic being open using different weighting techniques
position_description_6: Worked under Dr. Wee Kek Tan and Dr. Hsiang Hui Lek to develop a facial emotion-based music generator A CNN model which was 15 layers deep was created and trained on AffectNet dataset to classify human emotions into 1 of 5 categories Based on the detected emotion, 4 different pre-trained RNN models (trained on the hand-labelled chorus of 1000 songs) were used to generate music based on recognized emotions

headline: Bringing India onchain I Coinbase
summary: You're here for the story. Here it goes-  I was born and brought up in a small city in India where I first hand witnessed disparity between different classes of society.   In the first few years of my professional career, I tried to bridge those disparities by using the power of finance in catalyzing urban reform. I worked with Governments and Multilateral agencies such as the World Bank and Asian Development Bank to set up financial institutions committed to developing smart infrastructure in Africa and Southeast Asia.  A firm believer in capital for social good and equitable education for every child, I later helped raise funds from individuals, corporations, and foundations for a global nonprofit. My passion for creating social change drove me towards setting up two non-profit organizations that work towards empowering the underprivileged community.   In 2019, I was selected as a part of the LGT fellowship cohort- a group of ten changemakers working around the globe to help create social change. In late 2020, I got sold on the promise of decentralization and permissionless systems spent the next year or so building multiple onchain products and communities. The products I've built have won grants from foundations of all major blockchains.  My vision for the next decade is to build at the frontier of technology and create protocols and structures to bring India and the world onchain.  When I am not talking about bringing the world onchain or sustainable social impact, I am talking about football, rock music, or my cross-country travels.   Interested in knowing more, ping me on twitter @saxenasaheb and we‚Äôll set up some time to chat.

summary: With over 11 years of experience in building high-quality tech products, I‚Äôve navigated a diverse career journey‚Äîfrom working as a full-stack developer for 7 years to stepping into engineering leadership roles. In my current role, I‚Äôm focused on building next-gen AI solutions and a spectrum of tools that push the boundaries of innovation. I have a proven track record of setting up multiple codebases and projects from scratch, ensuring they are built to scale and serve millions of daily active users.  Starting my career as a frontend engineer, I developed a strong foundation in frontend technologies, which continues to influence my approach to creating user-focused, scalable solutions. Over the last 4 years, I‚Äôve been leading and growing engineering teams from the ground up, with a keen focus on hiring top talent and fostering high-performing teams.  As the founding engineer at Scaler, I‚Äôve had the privilege of building its tech ecosystem from scratch, designing systems that are future-ready and can handle scale. I‚Äôm passionate about using technology to solve complex problems, build impactful products, and empower teams to excel.

headline: Competitive Programmer, Problem Solving, Distributed Systems, Low Level Design, AWS, Apache Kafka
summary: I‚Äôm a Software Engineer with 14+ months of experience delivering scalable (Low Level Designs and Patterns), production-grade systems using Java, Spring Boot, React, Angular, Express.js and AWS.  I‚Äôve contributed across the entire development lifecycle ‚Äî from designing backend architectures and building responsive frontends to deploying cloud-based solutions and optimizing performance. I work closely with cross-functional teams in Agile environments, ensuring high code quality and fast delivery.  Key Highlights: 1. Designed reusable backend components that reduced redundant DB entries by 99.8% and eliminated 4,000+ lines of duplicate logic.  2. Built an end-to-end document processing pipeline using React (frontend) and AWS Lambda, SQS, and S3 (backend) ‚Äî processing over 10K PDFs/day and cutting EC2 costs by ~60%.  3. Optimized slow API ingestion from 16s to 2s using backend batching and indexing while ensuring real-time accuracy on the UI side.  4. Developed and maintained dynamic frontend interfaces using React and Angular, improving user experience and reducing load time.  5. Improved frontend-backend integration by designing clear REST APIs and improving performance across both layers.  I'm actively seeking Software Engineering roles where I can build impactful systems and contribute to both robust backend services and seamless user experiences.
position_description_1: 1. Designed a master-reference model to handle recurring jobs efficiently, reducing redundant database entries by 99.8% and eliminating over 4,000 lines of duplicate logic using a reusable component-driven approach. Improved maintainability and long-term scalability.  2. Developed an end-to-end Fortnox API integration pipeline using AWS SQS, Lambda, and S3, enabling asynchronous voucher processing across multi-tenant systems. Handled 10K+ PDFs/day with reliability, leading to a ~60% reduction in EC2 costs.  3. Optimized critical third-party API ingestion by implementing batch data fetching, memory-efficient data structures, and compound indexing, reducing processing time from 16 seconds to 2 seconds, while maintaining accuracy for real-time workflows.  4. Refactored and scaled the billing module to support 5,000+ daily requests, using worker threads, batched I/O operations, and optimized DB queries. This improved request handling under high load with consistent performance.  5. Improved application performance by 22% through query profiling, database indexing, and removing bottlenecks in compute-heavy endpoints. Changes were production-tested with real workloads to ensure stability and consistency.  6. Designed core backend architecture to support future growth and modular development, with clearly defined service boundaries and efficient database schemas. Resulted in faster feature delivery and improved cross-team integration.  7. Worked in a cross-functional Agile team, collaborating on scalable backend solutions and feature rollouts. Used Git, JIRA, and regular code reviews to maintain engineering standards and ship reliable software.
position_description_2: 1. Refactored 2,800+ lines of legacy UI code by designing a reusable React component system, improving maintainability and consistency across 9+ parent modules. Enabled faster feature rollout and simplified testing through modular design.  2. Built and shipped dynamic, state-driven front-end components in React, optimizing rendering logic and reusability. Reduced UI development time by ~18% by streamlining component composition and state management workflows.  3. Developed a full-stack task management platform using the MERN stack, following MVC principles to ensure modularity and scalability. Created secure RESTful APIs to handle real-time task tracking and updates.  4. Integrated real-time notifications with Web Push API, enhancing task engagement by 15%. Added interactive data visualizations with Chart.js and D3.js to deliver actionable insights for end-users.  5. Collaborated in an Agile team of 8 engineers, participating in sprint planning, code reviews, and issue tracking. Used Git and GitHub for source control, branching strategies, and CI alignment.  6. Resolved 6+ high-priority bugs in production features, improving system stability, responsiveness, and user experience across key workflows.
position_description_3: 1. Led the integration of Couchbase Lite to enable offline-first architecture on mobile, allowing real-time data read/write access without connectivity. Ensured reliable service data management in low-network environments.  2. Built robust RESTful API integration layer using Retrofit 2 with a clean MVVM architecture, resulting in modular and testable code and significantly improved data fetch reliability across network conditions.  3. Integrated Google Maps SDK (standard view) for real-time location services and resolved 3+ rendering/location accuracy bugs, improving UX for field service use cases.  4. Self-learned and implemented biometric authentication for secure login flows, showcasing the ability to rapidly adopt Android security best practices and implement device-native features.  5. Improved app stability by fixing 7+ critical bugs and adopting Kotlin Coroutines to optimize performance of asynchronous tasks, reducing UI thread blockage and improving responsiveness. .
position_description_4: 1. Built simple RESTful APIs using Firebase Realtime Database and Firebase Authentication, enabling basic user login, content retrieval, and real-time data sync in the Android app.  2. Worked with CMS-like structures to organize and display video content dynamically, improving the content navigation and app usability.  3. Conducted hands-on UI/UX testing to validate app responsiveness and functionality across devices, contributing to a cleaner user experience.  4. Gained early exposure to Kotlin, MySQL basics, and foundational concepts of mobile development including frontend-backend integration.
position_description_5: 1. Gained hands-on exposure to the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC), understanding phases such as requirement analysis, design, development, testing, and deployment.  2. Practiced unit testing and test-driven development (TDD) principles to write clean, verifiable code and reduce regression errors during future updates.  3. Learned debugging techniques to trace logical and runtime errors across multiple layers of the application stack, enhancing code reliability.  4. Explored the fundamentals of secure development practices, including input validation and error handling, to ensure safer code throughout the lifecycle.  5. Worked closely with mentors to analyze and break down complex problems, improving my ability to shape solutions with a clear, structured approach.

Supporting engineering hiring across all levels ‚Äì from junior to leadership roles.    2. Driving end-to-end technical hiring processes to ensure timely and quality closures.    3. Proven expertise in real-time control tower execution, transforming last-mile efficiency through data-led insights and cross-functional collaboration.   Currently serving as a Assistant Manager - Instamart Operation Strategy (Central Team) at Swiggy India, I lead cross-functional teams to ensure seamless execution of operational strategies, including surge optimization, CPD leakage reduction, and stakeholder collaboration. My role involves designing payout structures, resolving surge issues, and implementing innovative solutions to solve complex business challenges.  Previously, as a Control Tower Executive - Operation Analyst, I developed robust reporting infrastructures, automated data collection processes, and built data pipelines to provide real-time operational insights. My ability to collaborate with stakeholders and lead teams has consistently resulted in improved efficiency and business outcomes.  I hold an MBA in Finance & Marketing and a BE in Mechanical Engineering, which have equipped me with a strong analytical mindset and a passion for leveraging data to drive innovation and growth.  Key Highlights:  Proficient in SQL, Python, Data Visualization, and Business Intelligence Tools.  Proven track record in process optimization, automation, and team leadership.  Recognized by Swiggy - Think Big Value Award (Slot Sign Up Rockers Team) - 2025 Appreciation for League of Champions Award - OND 2024 Appreciation for Best Performance Employee - 2021  NCC 'C & B' Certificate Holder ‚Äì Completed 15-day Army Attachment Training Camp. National-Level Basketball Player and NCC Certificate Holder, showcasing discipline and teamwork.  I am passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and am always eager to take on new challenges that push the boundaries of innovation. Let‚Äôs connect and explore how we can drive success together!

headline: Engineering Leader - ML & AI @ Adobe | IIM-C Alumni
summary: As an engineering manager, I've spearheaded transformative initiatives in the data & AI domain, harnessing cutting-edge technologies to drive innovation and deliver tangible value to organizations. A cornerstone of my leadership style has been championing the adoption of low/no code solutions(abstracted applications), ML and Gen-AI, revolutionizing traditional processes and accelerating our velocity in delivering impactful results. Through these initiatives, I've streamlined operations, reduced time to insight, and propelled efficiency and productivity to new heights.  I firmly believe that my strategic leadership has been instrumental in steering our team/s towards success. By providing mentorship, coaching, and guidance, I've empowered my team to embrace emerging technologies and methodologies, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation. Central to this approach is the focus on scaling lean, effective teams, which has not only facilitated our growth but also positioned us as leaders in our field, aligning with the broader organizational objectives.  Furthermore, my initiatives have significantly enhanced our ability to derive insights from data and drive informed decision-making. Through democratizing access to ML capabilities and optimizing workflows, there is an acceleration in time to insight, enabling faster and more informed decision-making across the organization. These achievements have not only bolstered operational efficiency but also unlocked new avenues for growth and innovations in the dynamic landscape of data and AI.

headline: Analytics @Swiggy || Senior Manager
summary: Enabling Customer Experience & Fraud business outcomes by data driven decisions
position_description_1: Responsible for Analytics roadmap creation, and its execution to drive org's AOP goals  ‚óè Customer Hazard Score (CHS): Redefined the North start metric for CX from Voice of customer (NPS) based methodology to customer behavior based metric called CHS (defined based on retention repeats) leading to major changes in the CX strategy driving over ~20K iOPD for Food & Instamart Marketplace ‚óè CCC (Consecutive Compounding Crazy) Interventions: Responsible for creation of a customer churn risk score and E2E execution of Priority Mode based on CCC score for the customers who were grieved by bad experience multiple times driving ~5K iOPD by focusing on right set of customers ‚óè  Trusted DE: Collaborated to create 4 DE Fraud Models (based on cancellations, Complaints, DE Pay-out & Floating Cash) which were combined to generate a trusted DE cohort having 3x better Performance on the platform. Also, responsible for productionalisation of the framework in Swiggy‚Äôs assignment logic from analytics perspective ‚óè Ring-fencing Target Group: Developed framework to define premium and potentially premium customers based on past behaviour, affluent markers & loyalty, who are required to be safe guarded for better experience across all touchpoints from Swiggy, which showed 3.5x ROI on CCC interventions & 1.5x returns on customer complaints from OPD perspective ‚óè Driven ~1.5 Rs reduction in cost for Swiggy PnL across multiple initiatives in the Trust & Safety charter. Identified Fraud & inefficiencies in inventory management from POD x Warehouse side contributing to ~70p goodness. Real-time monitoring for potential COD customer driven cancellation prone orders leading to ~10p savings. ~30p opportunity was realised from Free cash abuse by New/Dormant users on Instamart ‚óè Managed a group of 5-6 analysts directly, mentored them on their business acumen, Problem solving etc

summary: With over 7 years of experience in the Indian e-commerce and telecom industries, I am a seasoned business leader who excels in category management, marketing, product management and business development. I hold an MBA from FMS Delhi, one of the premier B-schools in the country, and a B.E. in Electrical Engineering from IIEST Shibpur, a reputed engineering institute.  Currently, I am a Senior Category Manager at Flipkart, India's leading online marketplace, where I lead the category sell for mobile accessories, a high-growth and high-margin portfolio. Prior to this, I managed the appliances category, overseeing customer acquisition, engagement, and on-platform experience for a portfolio valued at over USD 265 Million. I also have a strong background in marketing, having led several successful campaigns for various categories at Flipkart, as well as product strategy, having worked at Vodafone Idea, one of the largest telecom operators in India.   I am passionate about creating value for customers and stakeholders, leveraging my expertise in B2C e-commerce, data-driven decision making, and cross-functional collaboration. I am also a versatile hobby-seeker, indulging my passion for creative arts and sports, which complements my strategic and innovative approach in the business arena. I aspire to grow as a leader and a learner, and to contribute to the digital transformation of India.

headline: Co-Founder at Noa ‚Ä¢ IIT Madras
summary: India has the equator passing by and ranked as the second largest producer of milk, yet it faces 63% population deficient in Vitamin D and 58% deficient in B12; eating up a large chunk of productivity!   Building Noa, a farm to market wellness platform from India for the globe, 1 NCD at a time.  Why?  1/3 amongst the 140 crores Indians are facing cardiovascular issues, 1/5 Indians are in chronic stress and more than 70% Indians face poor gut health issues. Similar alarming data is present in other non-communicable disease categories as well. One of the major reasons for this is non-fulfillment of daily micros and macros of nutrition. On the supply side, these requirements can be met by plant based functional food, nutraceuticals and the right marriage of building habits & trusted advisory. These plant based nutraceuticals find their key active ingredients sourced directly from the farms hence enabling us to build a purpose driven platform impacting the growers of the country.  Idea Genesis - A) Personal itch - Personally went through a slump of poor health, weighing almost a quintal! Not that I was a novice in fitness, although I did powerlifting during college days yet I was simply unable to hit the gym post subscribing to it twice. It was only after pushing myself for a blood test and correcting B12 & D deficiencies and constantly improving my gut health did I find my way towards losing more than 12 kgs.   B) Farmer Impact - Committed to the vision of impacting farmers and helping them earn better, farm to market is a great lever in the entire agri-food value chain for driving purpose. Chose the difficult way of creating something premium and valuable for the consumers and a win-win for all the farmers as well as the business. C) Market Size - Currently India stands at only 2% market contribution of nutraceuticals on the world level yet it is a $5B market growing at a CAGR of 15% and expected to hit $20B by 2030. US and Europe markets stand at massive $90B and $80B opportunities having high affinity and trust for Indian based nutraceuticals and wellness practices.  Does the above space intrigue you to solve it from first principles? Feel free to connect.
position_description_2: Head Initiatives, Board Observer.  Helping more than 10L Indian farmers solve for their crop issues, increase their income and fulfill their Agri input needs right at their door steps; all digitally! Currently, I serve as a Staff Data Scientist at Inmobi, where I have led high-impact projects such as real-time margin optimization and pricing strategies, driving multi-million-dollar revenue increases using cutting-edge technologies including Databricks, Azure, and PySpark.  My expertise spans Python, SQL, Apache Spark, and popular ML frameworks such as Scikit-Learn, LightGBM, and TensorFlow. I am deeply experienced in building scalable machine learning pipelines, mentoring teams, and deploying AI solutions on cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure. Throughout my career, I have successfully delivered projects in margin optimization, bid optimization, user profiling, fraud detection, click-through rate prediction, and brand safety by blending advanced ML techniques with business acumen. headline: Global HR Leader | Driving Impact through Talent Strategy, Engagement, Performance & Development
summary: With two decades of experience in the HR function, I have taken on key leadership roles across Business Partnering, Program Management, Employee Engagement, HR/Employer Branding, Talent Planning, Developing and Sustaining Compensation Strategies, and Structuring Performance Management Frameworks. Having had the opportunity to work within the technology, telecom, entertainment and start-up space, I have consistently focused on instilling innovation as a value and implementing effective change management to build a unique work culture in every organization I have worked with.  Through all these and other roles, I have sought out opportunities to empower people and create a tangible impact. Over the years, I have gained extensive experience in reforming, streamlining and conceptualizing HR working methodologies, as well as in developing new approaches to work in a way that helps achieve business growth.  A key area of focus for me has been empathy-driven diversity programs that lay emphasis on the inclusion of employees across segments, and on cross-cultural hiring and inclusion.  I have developed a  passion for improving the management of people resources across organizations, including initiating programs that directly benefit employees in terms of creating a safe and engaged work culture, as well as ensuring fair compensation and welfare, while outlining transparent and effective performance management solutions.   At the end of the day, my job involves people and I have constantly been driven to excel and bring out excellence in teams I have worked with, while encouraging strong workplace relationships.  My wide-ranging interests - from animal welfare to mythology, archaeology and spirituality in the Indian context, equip me with insights and perspective on culture, people and the world at large.
